name: Motorsport
overview:
Motorsport.com, is the industry’s comprehensive online destination for motorsports news. We provide interactive multi-media experiences of race series through exclusive videos and photos, race standings, schedules, locations, race team profiles and other unique racing content. Motorsport.com’s chairman is Emerson Fittipaldi. A two time F1 world champion and two time Indy 500 winner, Emerson is an accomplished sport and business legend. Emerson considers motorsport.com’s digital distribution platform the ideal vehicle for the world’s top brands to engage race fans and capitalize on the explosive growth in advertising dollars invested in the industry.

We provide in-depth, up-to-the-minute coverage on the full spectrum of motor racing and rallies, including:

Formula 1
Nascar
Sports car
Rally
Drag racing
Historical
Drifting

We’re fans, and we’re fan-driven; make us your destination for motorsport content on the Internet today! Our Team

Located in six countries and three continents around the world, our international staff shares a common passion for motorsports. We also work with a pool of leading journalists who cover motorsports, ensuring that we deliver the most reliable and timely news and information.

video_embeds.description: Motorsport.com is the destination for the world’s most loyal fans.
